title: Parlour

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Parlour in a player-owned house is one of the only two types of rooms a player can build starting at level 1 Construction. Building a parlour costs 1,000.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Parlour
For a list of all items and upgrades within the Construction skill, see Construction/Level up table.
Parlour
Released31 May 2006 (Update)
Icon
Construction level1
Cost1,000
Door layout
Parlour

The Parlour in a player-owned house is one of the only two types of rooms a player can build starting at level 1 Construction. Building a parlour costs 1,000.

There are 5 hotspots available:

  • Bookcase space
  • Chair space
  • Curtain space
  • Fireplace space
  • Rug space

Contents

  • 1 Bookcase
  • 2 Chairs
  • 3 Curtains
  • 4 Fireplace
  • 5 Rug

Bookcase[edit | edit source]

Removing a bookcase does not destroy any of the books stored.

Level Bookcase Materials Experience Cost
4 Wooden bookcase Plank x4
Nails x4 		115 864 - 4,252[c 1]
29 Oak bookcase Oak plank x3 180 1,416
40 Mahogany bookcase Mahogany plank x3 420 6,612
  1. ↑ Cost changes depending on the type of nails used.

Nails x3 		87 648 - 3,189[c 1]
19 Oak chair Oak plank x2 120 944
26 Oak armchair Oak plank x3 180 1,416
35 Teak armchair Teak plank x2 180 1,892
50 Mahogany armchair Mahogany plank x2 280 4,408
  1. ↑ 1.0 1.1 1.2 Cost changes depending on the type of nails used.
